Sempat Ricuh dengan Polisi di Depan PTIK, Massa GMBI Lanjut Demo di KPK
06 Nov 2019, 12:24 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Massa Gerakan Masyarakat Bawah Indonesia (GMBI) melakukan aksi unjuk rasa di Kebayoran Baru, Jakarta Selatan. Massa sempat terlibat ricuh dengan aparat polisi lantaran salah satu peserta aksi, diduga dipukul oleh oknum polisi.
Ketua Distrik LSM GMBI Jakarta Timur Tomy A Leleulija mengatakan, awalnya massa melakukan aksi unjuk rasa di depan Gedung Kejagung, Kabayoran Baru, Jaksel. Selesai dari situ, massa melintas PTIK untuk melanjutkan aksi di depan gedung KPK.
"Pas di perempatan PTIK berpapasan dengan iring-iringan Kapolri, mereka mendahulukan rombongan Kapolri dan sementara kami juga kan dikawal. Di situ terjadi miss komunikasi," kata Tomy saat dihubungi detikcom, Rabu (6/11/2019).
Kericuhan pun terjadi hingga terjadi percekcokan dan berakhir pemukulan terhadap peserta aksi yang diduga dilakukan oleh oknum polisi. "Ternyata nggak lama polisi dan TNI di situ main pukul adu jotos. Ada dua anggota kami kena pukul, memar di bibir dan pecah bibirnya," imbuh Tomy.
Tomy berharap polisi mengusut insiden tersebut. Tomy meminta oknum yang memukul diproses sesuai aturan yang berlaku.
"Kami berharap, karena videonya sudah ada sama anggota kami dan ini viral, kami harap polisi dan ada selesaikan ini dengan baik, anggota agar diproses hukum tetap berjalan," tuturnya.
text:
Had Ricuh with the Police in Front of PTIK, Mass of GMBI Continued the Demo at the KPK
Nov 06 2019, 12:24 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Mass Movement of the Indonesian Lower Community (GMBI) held a demonstration in Kebayoran Baru, South Jakarta. The crowd was involved in a riot with the police because one of the participants in the action was allegedly beaten by a police officer.
East Jakarta GMBI District Chair Tomy A Leleulija said, initially the mass held a demonstration in front of the AGO Building, Kabayoran Baru, South Jakarta. After that, the masses passed by PTIK to continue the action in front of the KPK building.
"When PTIK intersection crossed the Indonesian National Police convoy, they prioritized the police chief and while we were also guarded. There was a communication miss," Tomy said when contacted by AFP on Wednesday (11/06/2019).
A riot ensued until a dispute ensued and ended the beating of participants in the action allegedly carried out by police officers. "It turns out that the police and TNI took a long time to play at a fist fight. There were two of our members who were hit, bruised on the lips and broken lips," added Tomy.
Tomy hopes that the police will investigate the incident. Tomy requested that the person who was hit be processed according to the rules in force.
"We hope that because the video is already in the presence of our members and this is viral, we hope that the police and there will resolve this well, so that members of the law will continue to be processed," he said.
